title: OGP Embed Settings
enable-help: Enable automatic embedding of OGP previews for URLs in posts
timeout-help: Maximum time to wait for OGP data from external sites
cache-ttl-help: How long to cache OGP data (in hours)
max-description-help: Maximum character length for description preview
show-favicon-help: Display website favicons in OGP cards
open-new-tab-help: Open OGP links in new browser tabs
author: Author
description: This plugin automatically embeds Open Graph Protocol previews for URLs in posts. It provides caching, security features, and responsive design.
enter-url: Please enter a URL to test
no-data: No OGP data found for this URL
settings-saved: OGP Embed settings have been saved successfully.
cache-cleared: All OGP cache has been cleared successfully.
cache-error: Failed to clear cache. Please try again.
